abstract: Manufacturer iLuv has an audio plug that accommodates two sets of headphones with a separate volume control for each.
snippet: Manufacturer iLuv has an audio plug that accommodates two sets of headphones with a separate volume control for each.
lead_paragraph: The iPad is a great way to watch movies on, say, a plane trip. But if you are traveling with someone, you endanger your domestic bliss by hogging the entertainment and walling yourself off ("Sorry, dear, you'll have to amuse yourself by re-reading the SkyMall catalog while I watch 'Bridesmaids.'")

headline.main: Sharing Audio on Pods, Pads and Phones
